channel.title: The Morning Boot – Daily Tech News with The Root Access
channel.description: The Morning Boot delivers fast, no-nonsense daily tech news with root-level access to what actually matters — cybersecurity, AI, cloud, enterprise IT, startups, and digital policy. Start your day informed, not overloaded.
channel.author: The Root Access
channel.itunes:author: The Root Access
channel.itunes:summary: The Morning Boot delivers fast, no-nonsense daily tech news with root-level access to what actually matters — cybersecurity, AI, cloud, enterprise IT, startups, and digital policy. Start your day informed, not overloaded.

item.title: Communication in IT
item.description: This is our first episode, and a bit different, no news, today, we start this show with what matters most, Communication in IT. and that's all. Not presentation skills. Not slide design. Some guidelines to Communication that actually works in IT. Because here’s a widely accepted truth across engineering leadership, consulting, and executive management: Most IT failures are not technical failures. They are communication failures.
item.dc:creator: The Root Access
item.itunes:summary: This is our first episode, and a bit different, no news, today, we start this show with what matters most, Communication in IT. and that's all. Not presentation skills. Not slide design. Some guidelines to Communication that actually works in IT. Because here’s a widely accepted truth across engineering leadership, consulting, and executive management: Most IT failures are not technical failures. They are communication failures.

item.title: Trailer
item.description:
This is The Morning Boot — daily tech news with The Root Access.

A short, focused show built for IT leaders, cloud engineers, security professionals, founders, and anyone responsible for real systems in the real world.

Every episode breaks down what’s happening in AI, cloud, security, and enterprise tech — without the hype, without the fluff, and without wasting your time.
We cut through headlines, trends, and buzzwords to get to the practical impact: how this changes the way you build, operate, secure, and scale.

No panels. No interviews. Just clear context, sharp insights, and real-world implications you can actually use.

Think of this as your daily boot-up for the tech world — fast, grounded, and built for people who need signal, not noise.

If you work in tech, or you rely on it to run your business, you’re in the right place.

Welcome to The Morning Boot.
